recipes.title: Spagetti bolognese sauce
recipes.ingredients:
- 1 tablespoon olive oil
- 1 onion, finely chopped
- 500 g italian tomato sauce
- 500 g minced beef/pork
- 1 tbsp dried oregano
- 1 tsp sugar
- 1 tsp salt
- pepper
- chilli powder, to taste
- 2 garlic cloves, finely chopped
recipes.steps:
1. Heat olive oil in a pan. Add onions and cook, stirring occasionally, until translucent.
2. Increase the heat to medium-high, add minced meat and cook until browned.
3. Stir in tomato sauce, finely chopped garlic, season with salt, sugar, chilli and pepper. Reduce heat to low; simmer, stirring occasionally, with lid slightly open. Cook for 40 minutes.
4. Add oregano to the sauce, cook for 10 more minutes and it's all done.
5. In a large pot of boiling salted water, cook pasta according to package instructions; drain well.
6. Serve with pasta and don't forget to put a lot of shredded gouda cheese on top.

recipes.title: Apple pie
recipes.ingredients:
- 300 g flour
- 100 g soft butter
- 100 g sugar
- 2 egg yolk
- half pack of baking powder
- milk (enough to knead the dough)
- 1 kg apple, peeled, cored and shredded
- cinnamon and sugar, to taste
recipes.steps:
1. In a mixing bowl add the flour, soft butter, sugar, egg yolk, baking powder and mix them together.
2. Add milk until the dough can be kneaded.
3. Divide the dough into two pieces.
4. Preheat the oven to 180 Celsius.
5. Sprinkle the work surface with flour and roll out bottom pie crust to circle. Wrap it around your rolling pin to transfer it to the pie plate.
6. Add shredded apple as a next layer, sprinkle with cinnamon and sugar.
7. Roll out second crust to a circle and place it on top of the apple layer. Poke the crust with a fork.
8. Bake the pie for 25 minutes.

recipes.title: Super soft mini baguettes
recipes.ingredients:
- 310 ml milk
- 30 g fresh yeast
- 25 g sugar
- 500 g flour
- 1 tsp salt
- 1 egg
- 30 g soft butter
recipes.steps:
1. Combine warm milk, sugar and the yeast. Let the mixture stand for 5 minutes to activate the yeast.
2. In a mixing bowl add flour, salt, butter and the yeast mixture.
3. Mix until the dough is formed.
4. Knead by hand on a lightly floured surface or with the dough hook attachment of the stand mixer until the dough is smooth and elastic. (this take about 10 minutes)
5. Grease a large bowl with oil. Transfer the dough to the bowl. Cover it with kitchen towel, preventing it from drying out. Let the dough rise for about 40-60 minutes, or until it has doubled in size.
6. Cut the dough into 10 portions. Shape the dough into tight balls, roll out into a triangle shape. Than roll the triangle, starting at the wide end and tucking the pointy end under the roll. Place them on a baking sheet.
7. Let the dough rise again for 20 minutes. Cover them with kitchen towel.
8. Preheat the oven to 180 Celsius.
9. Whisk the egg and water to make the egg wash. Lightly brush the egg wash over each bun. Sprinkle with the seeds to taste.
10. Bake the baguettes for 16 to 20 minutes, or until the buns are golden brown.

recipes.title: Sandwich bun
recipes.ingredients:
- 210 ml water
- 8 g fresh yeast
- 1 tbsp sugar
- 400 g flour
- 1 tsp salt
- 1 egg
- 1 tbsp oil
recipes.steps:
1. Combine 50 ml warm water, sugar and the yeast. Let the mixture stand for 5 minutes to activate the yeast.
2. In a mixing bowl add flour, salt and the egg, add the rest of the water (160 ml), oil and the yeast mixture.
3. Mix until the dough is formed.
4. Knead by hand on a lightly floured surface or with the dough hook attachment of the stand mixer until the dough is smooth and elastic. (this take about 10 minutes)
5. Grease a large bowl with oil. Transfer the dough to the greased bowl. Cover it with kitchen towel, preventing it from drying out. Let the dough rise for about 1 hour, or until it has doubled in size.
6. Cut the dough into 8 portions. Shape the dough into tight balls. Place them on a baking sheet.
7. Let the dough rise again for 20 minutes. Cover them with kitchen towel.
8. Preheat the oven to 180 Celsius.
9. Whisk the egg and water to make the egg wash. Lightly brush the egg wash over each bun. Sprinkle with the seeds to taste.
10. Bake the sandwich rolls for 16 to 20 minutes, or until the buns are golden brown.

recipes.title: Meatballs
recipes.ingredients:
- 500 g minced beef/pork
- 1 egg
- salt, pepper, to taste
- 60 g dried breadcrumbs (or panko crumbs)
- fresh parsley
recipes.steps:
1. Mix the minced meat, egg, spices and chopped parsley together.
2. With wet hands make balls from the mixture.
3. Preheat the oven to 200 Celsius.
4. Cover the balls with dried breadcrumbs, place them on a baking sheet.
5. Bake the meatballs for 40 minutes, turn them 2-3 times. The meatballs should all be evenly cooked and nicely browned on the outside.

recipes.title: Potato pottage with meatballs
recipes.ingredients:
- 1 tablespoon olive oil
- 1 onion, finely chopped
- 1 tbsp sweet paprika powder
- 1.5 kg (yellow) potato, peeled, diced
- 2 dl sour cream
- 2 dried bay leaves
- 1 tsp marjoram
- 1 tbsp vinegar
- 1 tbsp corn starch
- salt, pepper, to taste
recipes.steps:
1. Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium high heat. Add onions and cook, stirring occasionally, until translucent.
2. Add sweet paprika powder, stir for a little, then add diced potato to the pot. Pour water (broth is even better) over till it's just covered. Add salt, pepper, marjoram and bay leaves, and cook until the potato soften, about 30 minutes.
3. Add vinegar to the pot.
4. Mix the sour cream with corn starch and 1 tbsp water. Stir it until it gets smooth. Slowly pour the mix to the potato and stir until thickens.
5. Serve it with meatballs.

recipes.title: Pork stroganoff
recipes.ingredients:
- 500 g pork fillet (shoulder)
- 1 tbsp oil
- 3 garlic cloves, finely chopped
- 300 g mushroom
- 1 tbsp mustard
- 1 tbsp corn starch
- 1 dl cream
- 2 dried bay leaves
- salt, pepper, to taste
- pickles, chopped, to taste
- fresh parsley, chopped
recipes.steps:
1. Cut the port fillet into thin strips, season it with salt and pepper.
2. Heat a large pan, add a little oil, when it's really hot add the meat. Stir fry it until brown.
3. Add the garlic, stir in the mushrooms. On medium heat toss them for 5-10 minutes.
4. Add bay leaves, water to almost cover and cook for 40-60 minutes until the meat softens.
5. Mix cornstarch with cream and mustard. Add it to the pan with pickles, stirring constantly. Bring to a boil, cook and stir 2 minutes or until thickened.
6. Garnish with the parsley and serve with rice, noodles or macaroni pasta.

recipes.title: Lentil pottage (stew)
recipes.ingredients:
- 400 g green lentil
- 1 onion, finely chopped
- 2 garlic cloves, finely chopped
- 2 dried bay leaves
- 1 tbsp mustard
- 2 dl sour cream
- 1 tbsp flour
- 2 tsp sweet paprika powder
- salt, to taste
recipes.steps:
1. Pour lentils in a large pot and cover them with cold water. Allow to soak for at least 4 hours. Then drain the water and give the lentils another quick rinse with fresh, cold water.
2. Heat olive oil in a pan over medium high heat. Add onions and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally, until translucent.
3. Add lentils, bay leaves, mustard and salt to the pot. Add water to slightly cover. Cook for 60 minutes, until the lentils soften.
4. Mix sour cream, sweet paprika, flour and 2 tbsp water together in a bowl, add this mixture to the pot to thiken the stew. After a short boil it is all done.

recipes.title: Crunchy baked potato
recipes.ingredients:
- 1 kg potato, peeled, diced
- salt, to taste
- 1 tbsp baking soda
- 1 tsp olive oil
recipes.steps:
1. Pour diced potatoes in a pot with a little bit of salt and 1 tbsp of baking soda. Cook them for 8 minutes.
2. Drain the water, add 1 tsp of olive oil to the potato. You can spice it up if you want (e.g. with rosemary), mix it well.
3. Preheat the oven to 230 Celsius.
4. Bake the potato for 30 minutes, turn them 1-2 times.

recipes.title: Basic chia pudding
recipes.ingredients:
- 1.5 tsp chia seeds
- 100 ml milk of choice
- a little honey or a half banana
- berries for topping
recipes.steps:
1. Pour milk, chia seeds and optionally honey into a jar and mix well. Let settle for 2-3 minutes then mix again very well until you see no clumping.
2. Cover the jar and store in fridge overnight or for at least 2 hours.
3. Top with berries or other fruits.
recipes.notes: This pudding will keep well in the fridge, covered, for about 5 days.

recipes.title: Vanilla & orange chia pudding
recipes.ingredients:
- 1.5 tsp chia seeds
- 100 ml milk of choice
- vanilla extract
- orange zest
- a little honey or a half banana
- orange slices for topping
recipes.steps:
1. In a small jar, combine the milk, orange zest, and vanilla extract. Let settle for 2-3 minutes then mix again very well until you see no clumping.
2. Cover the jar and store in fridge overnight or for at least 2 hours.
3. Top with orange, drizzle with a little honey.
recipes.notes: This pudding will keep well in the fridge, covered, for about 5 days.

recipes.title: Basic tapioca pudding
recipes.ingredients:
- 150 g small pearl tapioca
- 700 ml coconut milk
- vanilla extract
- 1/2 tsp cinnamon
- lime zest
- berries or other fruits for topping
recipes.steps:
1. Combine tapioca, milk, vanilla extract and cinnamon in a pan on medium-high heat. Stir while bringing to a bare simmer.
2. Lower the heat and cook uncovered, at the lowest possible heat, until the tapioca pearls have plumped up and thickened. Stir occasionally so the tapioca doesn't stick to the bottom of the pan. (this take about 35 minutes)
3. Pour into jars and place in the refrigerator overnight.
4. Serve with sliced fresh fruit and lime zest.

recipes.title: Waffles a la mom
recipes.ingredients:
- 120 g butter
- whole 3 eggs
- 140 g flour
- 140 g sugar
- lemon zest
- 1 tsp baking soda
- pinch of salt
recipes.steps:
1. In a large bowl mix flour, a pinch of salt, lemon zest and baking soda together.
2. In a smaller bowl whisk butter with sugar, add the eggs one by one.
3. Gently fold the wet mixture into the dry one.
4. Preheat the waffle iron, brush with a little of oil.
5. Cook waffles until golden brown and crisp.
6. Serve immediately with maple syrup or fresh fruits.

recipes.title: Eggplant dip
recipes.steps:
1. Preheat the oven to 190 Celsius.
2. Wash the eggplants, cut them half and place them on a baking sheet (cutted side on bottom). Poke some holes in the eggplants with a knife.
3. Roast the eggplants for 45-50 minutes, turn them over at half time.
4. Let them cool completely.
5. Peel them with a knife. Make sure to remove any of the dark peel.
6. Place the eggplants in a food processor with salt and pepper.
7. Pour the dip into jars, keep them in the fridge.
8. Serve with toasted bread, hard eggs and lots of veggies.
recipes.notes: You can experiment by adding 1 tbsp mayo or olive oil or dries tomatoes to the dip.

recipes.title: Carrotcake cupcakes
recipes.ingredients:
- 250 g flour
- 200 g sugar
- 2 whole eggs
- 3 carrot, peeled, shredded
- 150 ml oil
- 1 tsp cinnamon
- 1 tsp clove
- nutmeg
- ginger to taste
- 1 tsp baking soda
- 100 g walnut/almond, chopped
- orange zest

Cream Cheese icing:

- 200 g cream cheese (mascarpone)
- 3 tbsp powdered sugar
- 1 tsp vanilla extract
recipes.steps:
1. Preheat the oven to 180 Celsius.
2. In a large bowl mix flour, orange zest, spices, baking soda and nuts together.
3. In another bowl mix the wet ingredients together: sugar, eggs, oil and shredded carrots.
4. Gently fold the wet mixture into the dry one. Stir them together.
5. Fill each muffin cup with batter.
6. Bake them for 20-25 minutes. (toothpick test)

Frosting:

Combine all icing ingredients until smooth and creamy. Spread over cooled muffins.

recipes.title: Double chocolate cupcakes
recipes.ingredients:
- 270 g flour
- 75 g unsweetened cocoa powder
- 250 g sugar
- 1 whole egg
- 200 ml plain yogurt
- 125 g butter
- 1 tsp baking soda
- pinch of salt
- 100 g chocolate chips
- 1 tsp vanilla extract

White chocolate ganache:

- 200 g white chocolate, roughly chopped
- 100 ml cream
- 1 vanilla bean
recipes.steps:
1. Preheat the oven to 180 Celsius.
2. In a large bowl mix flour, salt, cocoa powder, baking soda and chocolate chips together.
3. In another bowl mix sugar, egg, yogurt, vanilla extract and butter together.
4. Gently fold the wet mixture into the dry one. Stir them together.
5. Fill each muffin cup with batter.
6. Bake them for 20-25 minutes. (toothpick test)

Icing:

1. Fill a saucepan with some water and bring it to a very gentle simmer.
2. Place a metal or glass bowl over the warm water but make sure it doesn't actually touch the water. Pour the chocolate and cream into the bowl and stir frequently while it melts.
3. Once all of the chocolate is almost completely melted, remove the bowl from the heat. The rest of the chocolate will continue to melt off-heat. 
4. Scrape the vanilla bean seeds by cutting down the center of the bean first and then scraping the seeds with the flat side of a knife. Add the vanilla bean seeds to the cream.
5. Let it thicken as it cools. (30 min - 2 hours)
recipes.notes: Keep in the fridge for up to 5 days or frozen for up to 2 months.

recipes.title: Blueberry cupcakes
recipes.ingredients:
- 350 g flour
- 200 g sugar
- 3 whole eggs
- 200 ml plain yogurt
- 6 tbsp oil
- 1 tsp baking soda
- pinch of salt
- lemon zest
- 1 tsp vanilla extract
- 200 g blueberry
recipes.steps:
1. Preheat the oven to 180 Celsius.
2. In a large bowl mix flour, salt, baking soda together.
3. In another bowl mix sugar, eggs, yogurt, vanilla extract and oil together.
4. Gently fold the wet mixture into the dry one. Stir them together.
5. Fill each muffin cup with batter. Stud each muffin with blueberries.
6. Bake them for 20-25 minutes. (toothpick test)

recipes.title: Chocolate-cranberry cookies
recipes.ingredients:
- 150 g flour
- 50 g finely shredded coconut
- 50 g dried cranberry
- 100 g sugar
- 100 g butter
- 1 whole egg
- 1 tsp baking powder
- pich of salt
recipes.steps:
1. Preheat the oven to 180 Celsius.
2. In a large bowl mix flour, salt, baking powder, cranberry and shredded coconut together.
3. In another bowl mix sugar, egg and butter together.
4. Gently fold the wet mixture into the dry one. Stir them together.
5. Roll the dough into balls (walnut size) place them on baking sheet well spaced apart. Flatten each slightly using your palm. (around 1 cm thick)
6. Bake them for 13 minutes. (toothpick test)
7. Let them cool on a wire rack.
recipes.notes: You can use nuts, other dried fruits, chocolate to vary the recipe.
